title: Loving Hut - Ahimsa
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Previously located at 366-13, Shincheon 4-Dong, Dong-Gu, Mar 2016.
